bill_title: include certain speeding offenses in the point system for traffic violations for the purposes of driver license records.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to include certain speeding offenses in the point system for traffic violations for the purposes of driver license records. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-12-49.1 be amended to read as follows: 32-12-49.1. The following is a the listing of moving traffic offenses for which points may be assessed and the number of points assessed for a conviction for each offense: (1) Driving while intoxicated ten points ten points (2) Reckless driving eight points eight points (3) Eluding/attempting to elude a police officer six points six points (4) Drag racing six points six points (5) Failure to yield right-of-way four points four points (6) Improper passing four points four points (7) Driving on wrong side of roadway four points four points (8) Stop sign/light violation three points three points (9) Speeding on interstate highway: (a) Six to fifteen mph, inclusive, over posted limit one point one point (b) Sixteen to twenty mph, inclusive, over posted limit two points two points (c) In excess of twenty mph over posted limit three points three points (10) Speeding other than on interstate highway or in school or construction zone: (a) Six to ten mph, inclusive, over posted limit one point one point (b) Eleven to twenty mph, inclusive, over posted limit two points two points (c) In excess of twenty mph over posted limit three points three points (11) Speeding in school or construction zone three points three points (12) Other moving offenses two points two points For the purpose of this section, "other moving offenses" does not include speeding offenses. Section 2. That § 32-12-49.2 be amended to read as follows: 32-12-49.2. Any motor vehicle operator is subject to driver license or driving privilege suspension who, in accordance with the schedule provided in § 32-12-49.1, has been convicted of traffic violations resulting in the accumulation of fifteen twelve points within any twelve consecutive months, or twenty-two eighteen points within any twenty-four consecutive months.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
